title: Retail revenue from smart wearable devices worldwide 2014 and 2019
yAxis: Retail revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic displays the Retail of from smart in the Retail in 2014 and provides a forecast for 2019 .
In 2014 , the Retail of from smart pertaining to grocery and consumable products amounted to about 4.5 billion U.S.
